name: Cool Adventure
description:
It's in the title: it's an adventure and it's cool (IMO)

...some elaboration: a short 3D surreal atmospheric adventure game made in a few days for Adventure Jam 2022. It's an adventure game in the sense that you go on an adventure, but it doesn't follow most of the traditional adventure game tropes and has no dialogue. It's mostly calm but there is also some intense action.

Also takes some healthy inspiration from the egglike genre.
